ratings.comment: Lecture drags on, but worth it because he's passionate about the material and makes you think! Read the books and stay on top of the material and you'll have no problems.

This was easily my favorite class I've ever taken at Madison, and each year I stalk his listings to see if Bethea is teaching any other courses.  I was reluctant to join this class at first, but he made it memorable even years later!  He makes everything interesting and really hammers home what you'll need to know and he loves an active audience!

Bethea is one of the best teacher I've ever had. He's crystal clear in lecture and literally goes over every book chapter by chapter. There is a ton of reading to keep up with and the tests are challenging. It is not an easy A by any means, but Bethea is great and I would definitely take it again.
Easily the best professor I've had at Madison. The books you read are actually interesting. He really tries to engage the class and can be really funny!

I REALLY loved this class and am now in love with Russian Lit!! We did get behind on the reading the first few weeks & it was hard to catch up afterwards, but Prof. Bethea went through the books almost chapter by chapter and if you went to class & paid attention he pretty much told you everything you needed to know!He is a talented&inspiring prof!

Do not take this class for Comm B, unless you like doing pointless busy work. Prof Bethea was alright, but his TA's are terrible and I have never taken a more unorganized class at UW. We got really behind on the readings in the beginning of the semester and had to catch up reading hundreds of pages a week later on.
This was one of my favorite classes at Madison.  Knows his stuff, fun lecture, great books, lots of enthusiasm.  Couldn't recommend him more.

A very nice professor, the requirements are clear. You will not have to study for exams if you read all the works. I found this class to be a pleasure and a nice break from my science classes. Highly recommended!
I love this class and wish he taught more courses so I could take many many more with him.  Take his classes if they fit in your schedule!!!
Great professor!  Really knows what he's talking about when it comes to the literature, but also the Russian language, culture, history and geography.

Honestly,BEST. PROFESSOR. EVER. Sincerely miss going to his lectures.. I wish he taught more undergrad courses because I would take anything he offered. Passionate, approachable, and funny, he is truly the most inspiring teacher I have ever had. Wish I had taken the time to get to know him outside of class.

Prof Bethea is a super nice guy. Very fatherly and personable. He really tries to get to know his students and often tells funny and interesting personal stories about his family or travels to Russia. The novels we read in class were kind of boring, but the exams are super easy as long as you read. I got a 100% on every exam. Overall a good class.
Loves what he teaches and you can't help but get interested in the books as long as you read them and go to lecture.

I love Bethea!He is the best teacher I have ever had.He is very interesting and is great at connecting with students and the material.I never missed  a class even thought it was not manditory!He is a gifted teacher and I would highly recommend taking any class that he teaches!
Very good professor. Tells some great stories, and always refers text to modern day which is always fun. Probably my most interesting class.

He is a great professor! I highly recommend taking this class if you get the chance.  He makes the material come to life and tells stories from his own experiences that make everything pretty interesting.  He is very fair and there are really easy 2 or 3 question quizzes on mondays, but if you have read the back cover of the book you should be fine

What a great professor. I was surprised at the previous post, I think he looks WAY younger than 70 but I guess with that kind of enthusiasm it may keep you looking 15 years younger. He rocks! If your enjoyment of classes depends on the professor then he's your guy
Best professor I've ever had.  The man is hilarious.  And surprisingly enough, I've heard that he's like in his 70's.
No Comments

Probably one of the best teachers/professors I've ever had!! You never no what he is going to say. I truly thought this class was going to suck, I was dead wrong.  If you need a Lit. class, then this is the class to take.  Easy AB!! If you read most of the books!!
Really helpful guy with a lot to offer to his students. More professors should be like him.

This guy is an amazing professor.  He teaches with a lot of enthusiasm and is very clear in presenting the information that he will test you on.  Lecture is always lively and he is never scared to bring humor in if it isn't.  I'd recommend his classes to everyone.

This guy is amazing. He is an awesome professor who obviously likes the subject which makes it just that much better. Take this class if you like the idea of Russian Lit or even if you just like reading.
Great professor and also very friendly.  take the time to email him or talk to him with any questions.  take him if you're at all interested in russian lit.

This guy has such energy, and such enthusiasm.  He loves his job and you can tell, so it is wonderful to have a class with him.  I highly recommend taking any class with him but Russian lit trans was really wonderful.
AWESOME--Take Prof. Bethea if you get the chance, the man is flat out good at what he does.
Professor Bethea is amazing! One of the most lively, interesting, and dazzling professors I've had. Every class was exciting and the man cares about what he teaches.

This guy is AWESOME! He is very knowledgeable and a great speaker. He made an 857 page book the most fascinating work I've ever read. He always entertains while drawing the best out of his students. I definately recommend Professor Bethea.
